reviews.review:
Well what to say.....first of all after reading few of the critics reviews lately i got confused....have I watched the same movie as them....i could not relate to the facts like plot missing , no character development, to much of a length etc etc....guys what were u doing for last 10 years....this is not a standalone movie...it is the culmination of a cinematic universe built around 18 brilliant movies....characters are aleady developed , plot is already set. You just need to open your eyes(or rather brain). Dont tell us how we should feel after watching a particular movie....its ur presumption and ur feeling. General crowd is loving the movie. Its direction is brilliant (more than 50 characters stitched together beautifully) , acting is out of the park kind, action and fight sequence are breath taking , suspense is aww aspiring...ending is out of the box and truely brave and then we have thanos. A villain so powerful yet sypathetic whose methods might be wrong but his vision is relatable. We understand what he is trying to achieve (or on thaat note might have achieved in this movie only).
With all these  things there is still a positive point, all is not over yet (only for the comic books movies lover not for the so called meta critics). We are now craving for the second and probably the last part of this storyline, scheduled to release somewhere same time next year. We were waiting for this our entire life and we have got more than we deserve.
Go watch out the biggest phenomena of this decade without any apprehen
sions. Its a must watch.

PS - watch out for interactions between thor/rocket , stark/strange , banner aka hulk is different yet brilliant , spidey is cute but thanos is the main person to watch out for.
And yes there is a small fight between avengers and GOG (sorry i tried not to give a single spoiler).
This film is the perfect first part to the amalgamation of a decade worth of MCU movies
I found this movie to be completely satisfying and yet leaving me a hankering to know what's next.

Absolutely shocking. Unbelievable how the Russo brothers were able to handle so many characters and storylines in such a complex universe. This isnâ€™t a movie about the Avengers, this is a movie about Thanos.
Wow!!!!! Great movie! Hats off to all the cast and crew. DO NOT miss this movie.
Hands down the best marvel movie to date. Thanos just dropped the mic on everyone.
For all the hype, this movie delivered big time! Thanos is one hell of a bad guy and this was a movie full of surprises! Definitely a must watch.

As someone who gave into 'superhero fatigue' a long time ago, I'm happy to have given Infinity War a chance. Despite an overabundance of characters, the simple plot and dark atmosphere of the film made Infinity War a surprisingly unique viewing experience.
